thread.title: WATCH: Rob Gronkowski was dominant in high school
thread.title_full: WATCH: Rob Gronkowski was dominant in high school

title: WATCH: Rob Gronkowski was dominant in high school
text:
New England Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski (87) celebrates by spiking the ball after scoring a touchdown during the first half against the Buffalo Bills at New Era Field. Kevin Hoffman-USA TODAY Sports 
Rob Gronkowski is, was and perhaps always will be good at football. 
The Patriots tight end has carved out an impressive NFL career to this point, but his gridiron dominance began well before he attended the University of Arizona or joined New England as a second-round draft pick in 2010. 
Don’t believe us? Just check out the video below that surfaced Wednesday. It shows Gronk absolutely tearing it up back in high school, just like you’d expect.
